contracts Developed coordinated implemented and maintained standards and procedures to protect the security and integrity of information systems and data Performed vulnerability threat assessments to safeguard assets Conducted handson monitoring of network traffic for user violations of acceptable use policy and potential insider threats Designed installed configured and operated new and existing migration to the Microsoft Office 365 platform Created and executed IT budgets while maintaining cost efficiency Implemented Help Desk and remote support increasing employee productivity by ensuring proper network connectivity of all sites servers workstations telephone equipment and other network appliances Monitored network performance to determine possible areas for improvement and documented updates required for future upgrades Recommended changes to improve systems and network configurations and determine hardware or software requirements related to such changes Mentored and supported accessibility by configuring repairing and optimizing servers and workstations Designed and implemented network layout managed daily backup operations and recommended upgrades and improvements
